ivardefs.name: addresses_
ivardefs.desc: The identified conditions and other health record elements that are intended to be addressed by the goal.

ivardefs.name: category_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates a category the goal falls within.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: Human-readable and/or coded description of a specific desired objective of care, such as "control blood pressure" or "negotiate an obstacle course" or "dance with child at wedding".

ivardefs.name: expressedBy
ivardefs.desc: Indicates whose goal this is - patient goal, practitioner goal, etc.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: This records identifiers associated with this care plan that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate (e.g. in CDA documents, or in written / printed documentation).

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: Any comments related to the goal.

ivardefs.name: outcomeCode_
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the change (or lack of change) at the point when the status of the goal is assessed.

ivardefs.name: outcomeReference_
ivardefs.desc: Details of what's changed (or not changed).

ivardefs.name: priority
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the mutually agreed level of importance associated with reaching/sustaining the goal.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: Indicates whether the goal has been reached and is still considered relevant.

ivardefs.name: statusDate
ivardefs.desc: Identifies when the current status.  I.e. When initially created, when achieved, when cancelled, etc.

ivardefs.name: statusReason
ivardefs.desc: Captures the reason for the current status.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the patient, group or organization for whom the goal is being established.

ivardefs.name: target
ivardefs.desc: Indicates what should be done by when.
